summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TripStars Task Management System. All backend APIs (19/19 tests) and frontend functionality working perfectly. JWT authentication, role-based access control, user management, task management, and dashboard features all functioning as expected.
passed_tests: Backend: All 19 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Frontend: Login functionality for all three user roles
Frontend: Dashboard with stats cards loading correctly
Frontend: Role-based navigation (Admin sees all, Manager sees Dashboard+Tasks, Team Member sees Dashboard+MyTasks)
Frontend: Task status updates (Team Members on own tasks)
Frontend: JWT token persistence and logout
